original_title: This Isn't Secretary... It's a XXX Spoof!
overview: This new secretary has noticed an odd relationship at work between her and her boss. He doesn't seem to care muuch that she has so little work experience. Her boss seems to like it when she talks back to him. When she bent over and he grabbed her ass, she knew it was time to ask for a raise!
tagline: This secretary is getting the job done!
title: This Isn't Secretary... It's a XXX Spoof!
